description: Simple 5-step wizard for B2B outreach: Project → Companies → Contacts → Emails → Export

features.name: Fresh project structure
features.description: Clean Next.js 14 app with proper folder structure
steps: Create src/app with layout.tsx and page.tsx (landing/dashboard)
Create src/components folder with ui/ subfolder
Create src/lib folder for utilities (supabase.ts, apollo.ts, gemini.ts)
Create src/types/index.ts with all TypeScript interfaces
Set up Tailwind with clean globals.css
Create src/app/project/[id]/page.tsx for project wizard
features.acceptance: npm run build passes, clean folder structure exists

features.name: Supabase setup folder
features.description: Create supabase/ folder with SQL migrations and setup instructions
steps: Create supabase/README.md with setup instructions
Create supabase/migrations/001_initial.sql with tables: projects, companies, contacts, emails
Create supabase/migrations/002_schema_config.sql for flexible column storage
Include .env.example with NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL and NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
features.acceptance: supabase folder exists with clear instructions, SQL is valid

features.name: Step 1: Project creation
features.description: UI to create a new project with client info + optional doc upload
steps: Create src/app/new/page.tsx with project form
Fields: client_name, product_description, target_market, target_segment
Add file upload for pitch deck/brief (store in Supabase storage or just parse)
Use Gemini to extract key info from uploaded docs
Save project to Supabase, redirect to /project/[id]
Create src/components/ProjectForm.tsx as reusable component
features.acceptance: Can create project, data saves to Supabase, redirects to wizard

features.name: Step 2: Companies list
features.description: AI-generate company list from brief + manual add + enrichment
steps: Create src/app/project/[id]/companies/page.tsx
Button: 'Generate with AI' - uses Gemini to research companies matching criteria
Manual add form: company name, website, notes
AI enrichment: click to auto-fill description, relevance score
Import CSV: parse and add to list
Paste Excel: detect headers + example rows, map to schema
Save companies to Supabase linked to project_id
features.acceptance: Can generate companies via AI, add manually, import CSV, all save to DB

features.name: Step 3: Find contacts
features.description: Use Apollo People Search to find contacts at each company
steps: Create src/app/project/[id]/contacts/page.tsx
Create src/lib/apollo.ts with peopleSearch function
For each company, search Apollo for people by title keywords
Display results with name, title, email, LinkedIn
Let user select which contacts to keep
Save selected contacts to Supabase linked to company_id
features.acceptance: Apollo search works, contacts display, user can select and save

features.name: Step 4: Generate emails
features.description: Use Apollo AI or Gemini to generate personalized emails
steps: Create src/app/project/[id]/emails/page.tsx
For each selected contact, generate email using project context
Use Apollo AI endpoint if available, fallback to Gemini
Display generated emails with edit capability
Save emails to Supabase linked to contact_id
features.acceptance: Emails generate for each contact, editable, saved to DB

features.name: Step 5: Export
features.description: Export all data to CSV with user's flexible schema
steps: Create src/app/project/[id]/export/page.tsx
Show preview of all companies, contacts, emails in table
Let user reorder/rename columns before export
Generate CSV with selected columns
Download button for companies.csv, contacts.csv, emails.csv
features.acceptance: Can export to CSV, columns match user preferences

features.name: Flexible schema system
features.description: User can define their own column schema per project
steps: Create src/components/SchemaEditor.tsx
On project creation, user can paste Excel headers
Parse headers into column definitions
Store schema in project.schema_config (JSONB)
When importing/exporting, map to user's schema
AI uses schema context for better extraction
features.acceptance: User-defined schemas work, import/export respects them

features.name: Dashboard and navigation
features.description: Landing page showing all projects, wizard step navigation
steps: Update src/app/page.tsx to list all projects from Supabase
Add 'New Project' button linking to /new
Create src/components/WizardNav.tsx for step navigation
Show current step, completed steps, progress indicator
Add back/next navigation between steps
features.acceptance: Dashboard lists projects, wizard nav works, progress visible

features.name: User-provided API keys
features.description: Users enter their own Apollo/Hunter API keys instead of server-stored keys
steps: Create src/components/ApiKeyModal.tsx - modal to enter API keys
Store keys in localStorage (client-side only, never sent to server storage)
On contacts page, check if Apollo key exists in localStorage
If no key, show modal prompting user to enter their Apollo API key
Pass API key from client to API routes via request body (not env vars)
Update /api/find-contacts-apollo to accept apiKey in request body
Add settings page or gear icon to update/clear saved keys
features.acceptance: App prompts for API key if not set, keys stored in browser only, API calls work with user-provided keys

features.name: Loading states and error handling
features.description: Add proper loading spinners and error messages throughout the app
steps: Create src/components/ui/Spinner.tsx - reusable loading spinner
Create src/components/ui/ErrorMessage.tsx - reusable error display
Add loading states to all async operations (API calls, saves)
Show skeleton loaders while fetching data
Display user-friendly error messages when API calls fail
Add toast notifications for success/error feedback
features.acceptance: All async operations show loading state, errors display clearly

features.name: Project management (edit/delete)
features.description: Allow users to edit and delete existing projects
steps: Add edit button on project card in dashboard
Create src/app/project/[id]/edit/page.tsx for editing project details
Add delete button with confirmation modal
Cascade delete companies, contacts, emails when project deleted
Add 'Duplicate project' feature to copy a project as template
features.acceptance: Can edit project details, delete projects with confirmation

features.name: Contact search filters
features.description: Filter contacts by role/title when searching Apollo
steps: Add title/role filter input on contacts page
Common presets: CEO, Founder, Director, Manager, Buyer, Procurement
Pass title filter to Apollo API search
Show filter chips for active filters
Remember last used filters per project
features.acceptance: Can filter Apollo search by title, presets work

features.name: Email templates
features.description: Save and reuse email templates across projects
steps: Create email_templates table in Supabase
Add 'Save as template' button on email editor
Create template picker when generating emails
Include variables like {{contact_name}}, {{company_name}}
Default templates: Cold outreach, Follow-up, Introduction request
features.acceptance: Can save templates, use templates with variable substitution

features.name: Mobile responsive design
features.description: Make the app work well on mobile devices
steps: Add responsive breakpoints to all pages
Stack form fields vertically on mobile
Make tables horizontally scrollable on mobile
Adjust navigation for mobile (hamburger menu or bottom nav)
Test on iPhone/Android screen sizes
features.acceptance: App is usable on mobile devices, no horizontal overflow

features.name: Company enrichment with AI
features.description: Use AI to research and enrich company data automatically
steps: Add 'Enrich All' button on companies page
Use Gemini to research each company's description, industry, employee count
Add relevance scoring based on project criteria
Show enrichment progress with progress bar
Allow manual override of AI-generated data
features.acceptance: Can bulk-enrich companies with AI, shows progress

features.name: Quick actions and keyboard shortcuts
features.description: Add keyboard shortcuts for power users
steps: Cmd+N to create new project
Cmd+S to save current data
Arrow keys to navigate between items in tables
Enter to select/confirm
Show shortcut hints in UI
features.acceptance: Keyboard shortcuts work, hints visible on hover
